channel.title: Create RDS and connect to SSMS on Start with Amazon VPC and AWS VPN Site-to-Site.
channel.description: Recent content in Create RDS and connect to SSMS on Start with Amazon VPC and AWS VPN Site-to-Site.

item.title: Connect to SSMS
item.description: Connect to SSMS Server type: Database Engine Server name: Copy your Endpoint, afterwards, add your portnumber at the end of the Endpoint with comma between it. For example, your sever name look like database-1.cr2i22uge2rv.ap-southeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com,1433 Authentication: SQL Server Authentication Type in the username you created for the Amazon RDS database. Our example is admin. The Connect to Server interface look like this. Choose connect If you encounter an error while connecting to the database, please proceed to troubleshoot in the following steps.
